    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Charbon de plantes putréfiées</string>
            <string language="en">Coal from rotten plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohle von den faulen Betrieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carvão das plantas rotten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carbone dalle piante marcie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρακας από τις σάπιες εγκαταστάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carbón de las plantas putrefactas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">C'est la seconde illustration sur quatre montrant comment du charbon est formé à partir de plantes putréfiées.  Ici, la décomposition des plantes mortes est montrée.</string>
            <string language="en">This is second of four illustrations showing how coal is formed from rotten plants. Here, the rotting of dead plants is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes mortes</string>
            <string language="en">dead plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustible fossile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">putréfaction</string>
            <string language="en">rot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes putréfiées</string>
            <string language="en">rotten plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se décomposant</string>
            <string language="en">rotting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">surface</string>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei vier 
Abbildungen, die zeigen, wie Kohle von den faulen Betrieben gebildet 
wird. Hier wird das Verrotten der toten Betriebe gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram como o carvão é dado forma das plantas rotten. Aqui, 
rotting de plantas inoperantes é mostrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni 
che mostrano come il carbone è formato dalle piante marcie. 
Qui, la decomposizione delle piante guasti è indicata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
επιδεικνύουν πώς ο άνθρακας διαμορφώνεται από τις σάπιες 
εγκαταστάσεις. Εδώ, να σαπίσει των νεκρών εγκαταστάσεων 
εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cuatro 
ilustraciones que muestran cómo el carbón se forma de las plantas 
putrefactas. Aquí, la descomposición de plantas muertas se 
muestra.</string>
          </description>
